mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MYPARTNERS WHERE Members_Mid = #{param1} AND Request=#{param2}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) NUM, MYPARTNERS.*FROM FRIENDS WHERE ${param2} LIKE '%${param3}%') A WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1+(#{param1}-1)*10 AND #{param1}*10
mapper.update: UPDATE HabitatCountry SET H_Country_Code = #{h_country_code} WHERE Member_mid = #{member_mid}
